nodes.bodyText:
Please use quantitype Number:Temperature
Unless you need something specific, the existing channeltype temperatureC can be re-used.
sorry, not sure how I missed the existing channeltype, I am going to reuse it.

similar as previous one
Please make this a Number:Time with unit: hours
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -268,12 +277,17 @@
 	<channel-type id="usedhours">
 		<item-type>Number</item-type>
 		<label>Run Time</label>
-		<state pattern="%.0f" readOnly="true"/>
+		<state pattern="%.0f h" readOnly="true"/>
+	</channel-type>
+	<channel-type id="powerhours">
+		<item-type>Number</item-type>

@@ -268,12 +277,17 @@
 	<channel-type id="usedhours">
 		<item-type>Number</item-type>

+{
+	"deviceMapping": {
+		"id": [
+			"zhimi.humidifier.ca4"
+		],
+		"propertyMethod": "get_properties",
+		"maxProperties": 2,
+		"channels": [
+			{
+				"property": "power",
+				"siid": 2,
+				"piid": 1,
+				"friendlyName": "Power",
+				"channel": "power",
+				"channelType": "power",
+				"type": "Switch",
+				"refresh": true,
+				"actions": [
+					{
+						"command": "set_properties",
+						"parameterType": "ONOFFBOOL"
+					}
+				]
+			},
+			{
+				"property": "mode",
+				"siid": 2,
+				"piid": 5,
+				"friendlyName": "Mode",
+				"channel": "mode",
+				"channelType": "humidifierOperationMode",
+				"type": "Number",
+				"refresh": true,
+				"ChannelGroup": "actions",
+				"actions": [
+					{
+						"command": "set_properties",
+						"parameterType": "NUMBER"
+					}
+				]
+			},
+			{
+				"property": "fault",
+				"siid": 2,
+				"piid": 2,
+				"friendlyName": "Humidifier Device Fault",
+				"channel": "Fault",
+				"channelType": "miot_uint8",
+				"type": "Number",
+				"refresh": true,
+				"actions": []
+			},
+			{
+				"property": "humidity",
+				"siid": 3,
+				"piid": 9,
+				"friendlyName": "Humidity",
+				"channel": "humidity",
+				"channelType": "humidity",
+				"type": "Number",
+				"refresh": true,
+				"ChannelGroup": "Status",
+				"actions": []
+			},
+			{
+				"property": "target_humidity",
+				"siid": 2,
+				"piid": 6,
+				"friendlyName": "Target Humidity",
+				"channel": "targetHumidity",
+				"channelType": "humidity",
+				"type": "Number",
+				"refresh": true,
+				"ChannelGroup": "Status",
+				"actions": [
+					{
+						"command": "set_properties",
+						"parameterType": "NUMBER"
+					}
+				]
+			},
+			{
+				"property": "water_level",
+				"siid": 2,
+				"piid": 7,
+				"friendlyName": "Water Level",
+				"channel": "waterlevel",
+				"channelType": "waterlevel",
+				"type": "Number",
+				"refresh": true,
+				"ChannelGroup": "Status",
+                "transformation": "tankLevel",
+				"actions": []
+			},
+			{
+				"property": "led_brightness",
+				"siid": 5,
+				"piid": 2,
+				"friendlyName": "LED Brightness",
+				"channel": "bright",
+				"channelType": "humidifierLedBrightness",
+				"type": "Number",
+				"refresh": true,
+				"ChannelGroup": "actions",
+				"actions": [
+					{
+						"command": "set_properties",
+						"parameterType": "NUMBER"
+					}
+				]
+			},
+			{
+				"property": "buzzer",
+				"siid": 4,
+				"piid": 1,
+				"friendlyName": "Buzzer Status",
+				"channel": "buzzer",
+				"channelType": "buzzer",
+				"type": "Switch",
+				"refresh": true,
+				"ChannelGroup": "actions",
+				"actions": [
+					{
+						"command": "set_properties",
+						"parameterType": "ONOFFBOOL"
+					}

+			},
+			{

+				"piid": 8,

+				"type": "Switch",
+				"refresh": true,
+				"ChannelGroup": "Status",

+						"command": "set_properties",
+						"parameterType": "ONOFFBOOL"
+					}

+			{

+				"piid": 9,
+				"friendlyName": "Run Time",
+				"channel": "usedhours",

+				"type": "Number",

nodes.bodyText:
Number:Temperature
can re-use Channeltype temperatureC unless you need something specific that is not in there.
Note, the name gets overwritten with the name you have here.
